skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I am an expert in React and I enjoy crafting web applications. Additionally, I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and various CSS frameworks.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I have a strong command over Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase in backend development. My particular affinity lies with MongoDB.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have a knack for creating visually appealing interfaces that prioritize a seamless and intuitive user experience.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I'm adept at using Webflow's features to bring designs to life, ensuring responsive layouts, smooth interactions, and efficient workflows for effective web development.

portfolio.name: E-commerce Website
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform using React and Node.js. Implemented a responsive design with Tailwind CSS for a sleek user interface.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Dashboard
portfolio.description: Created a personalized dashboard for portfolio management. Utilized React components for dynamic data visualization and Tailwind CSS for styling.

portfolio.name: Social Media Analytics App
portfolio.description: Developed a data analytics app for social media metrics. Used React for the front end and integrated Tailwind CSS for UI/UX enhancements.
